hooks.prompt: Before this conversation is compacted, write a strategic journal entry. Extract the project name from the current working directory (just the last segment, e.g. 'cohouser' not the full path). Write a 1-3 line STRATEGIC summary of what was accomplished -- focus on the 'why' and the area of the product or business this touched, not tactical details like file names or line numbers. Append a single JSON line to ~/.claude/daily-journal/YYYY-MM-DD.jsonl (using today's date, creating the file if needed) with this format: {"timestamp": "<ISO 8601>", "project": "<name>", "summary": "<strategic summary>"}. Use the Bash tool with a single echo+append command. Do not include any other output.
